_header: Saint Martin went upon a day
_description: St. Martin and the Naked Pilgrim in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Martin went opon a dayfful richely rideand bi þe way…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …His frely face ay forto seAmen Lord len it might so be
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.173-178.
